TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DiscoveryClientProtocol/DiscoveryClientResultsFile extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents the root element of an XML document containing the results of all files written when the method is invoked.

remarks.format:
## Remarks When you invoke the <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.WriteAll%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, all resolved discovery documents and a file containing a map of all those files are saved to a directory. The map file is described in XML with the root element being <xref:System.Web.Services.Discovery.DiscoveryClientProtocol.DiscoveryClientResultsFile>; this class is passed to the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer> class to serialize the results.
